name: Time to Indulge! Emirates A380 First Class
description:
Wow!!!! This was one sensationally indulgent flight!  Join me as I experience the luxury of first class on board the famous Emirates A380.  

This flight review of EK405 from Melbourne, Australia to Singapore, covers the Emirates Lounge, boarding, take off, the incredible Emirates First Class suite, inflight dining, the famous Emirates bar and of course the onboard shower.

Emirates have the most extensive food and wine menus in the sky and on this flight review I show them in full.  

For more videos check out my channel where you'll find a range of airlines reviews in economy, business and first class including Emirates, British Airways, Etihad, Qatar, Qantas, Cathay Pacific, Singapore Airlines, LATAM, Baltic Air, Turkish Airlines and more

Route:    Melbourne to Singapore - 7:50 hrs
Flight:     EK405
When:    August 2017
Aircraft:  Airbus A380   registration A6EOI (May 2015)
Seat:       3A
Camera:  Sony FDR-AXP55

This video may not be reproduced without specific permission.
